turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Red Forman.
turn.1: What did Red Forman do in the military?
turn.2: Red was a Boatswain Mate in the Navy during World War II and Korea.
turn.3: Did he serve in any wars?
turn.4: He served on a destroyer but also saw land combat in Guadalcanal (August 1942 – February 1943) and Korea (1950 – 1953).
turn.6: As evidenced in Season 8, Episode 6 " Long Away," Red is wearing Submarine Warfare (Dolphins) on his garrison cap during the Veterans reunion.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: In one episode, he and Eric have both completely forgotten about Kitty's birthday, which deeply upsets her.
turn.9: What does he do to make up for it?
turn.10: After purchasing her some very low quality "gifts" from the only open nearby establishment, a garage, items Kitty immediately recognizes as junk, Red cheers her up by taking her square-dancing, an activity she enjoys.
turn.11: Does he have any other vices?
turn.12: Red loves to drink beer and consume food which is bad for his health, having suffered from a heart attack on one occasion.
